Navigate to 'https://example.com/products/electronics'

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button has foreground color #FFFFFF, background fill rgb(0,128,0), text size 16px, typeface 'Arial', boldness 700, 2px solid border of #006400, 8px corner radius, internal spacing 12px 24px, external margin 10px 0, and is enabled

Verify the hero banner image with source 'banner_promo.jpg' has alternative description 'Summer Sale Promotion', displayed size 1200x400px, original size 2400x800px, loads within 450ms, is centered horizontally, and has no watermark

Verify the 'Email Address' input field has prompt text 'Enter your email', current content is an empty string, 1px solid outline of #CCCCCC, background color #F8F8F8, width 320px, height 44px, vertical position 150px, aria-label 'Email input', and receives focus upon interaction

Verify the main header is visible, has background color #FFFFFF, height 60px, 1px bottom border in #E0E0E0, remains fixed at the top of the viewport, has padding 10px 20px, and maintains position during scroll operations
Verify the product description paragraph has font size 14px, font family 'Open Sans', foreground color #333333, text alignment 'left', outer spacing 20px 0, and opacity 1
Open the video player
Verify the video is initially muted, the fullscreen button is visible, the player's width is 800px, height is 450px, the video source is 'product_tour.mp4', and a 'Play' icon is present
Verify the shopping cart icon displays a count of '3' items
Verify each item listed in the cart has a background color of #F5F5F5, 15px internal spacing, and a smooth transition of 200ms on hover
Verify there are exactly 3 items listed in the cart
Trigger the 'Contact Us' modal

Verify the 'Contact Us' modal is visible, has a width of 500px, height of 350px, background color #FFFFFF, border radius 12px, animates in with a fade-in effect over 300ms, and is centered horizontally
Verify the 'Country' dropdown has current value 'USA', 20 options, is enabled, features a 1px border of #999999, background color #EEEEEE, becomes focused when clicked, width 200px, and height 36px
Verify the 'Terms of Service' link displays the text 'Terms of Service', default color #0000FF, aria-label 'Link to Terms and Conditions', and target URL 'https://example.com/terms'
Verify the 'Terms of Service' link turns #800080 when focused
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox initial state is not selected, associated label text is 'Remember me', visual dimensions are 18x18px, is visible, and its shape is square
Open the user profile page
Verify the sidebar's width is 250px, height is 100% of viewport, background color #F0F0F0, positioned at the left edge of the screen, and scroll position is at 0px initially
Verify the progress bar for file upload current width indicates 75% completion, fill color is rgb(60,179,113), displays a smooth transition over 500ms when updating, and its current value is 75%
Activate the date picker
Verify the date picker selected date is '2023-10-26', input field's placeholder says 'Select a date', border color on focus is #007bff, has border radius 4px, and is enabled
Hover over the info icon

Verify the tooltip is visible, displays the text 'Additional information here', has background color #333333, font size 12px, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, and top position 20px relative to the icon
Verify the 'Search' icon has source 'search_icon.svg', color #666666, width 24px, height 24px, alt text 'Search', and aria-label 'Search button'
Click on the 'Reviews' tab
Verify the 'Reviews' tab becomes active with background color #FFFFFF, text boldness 700, 2px solid bottom border of #007bff, padding 10px 15px, and displayed text 'Reviews (120)'
Verify the pagination component has '5' total page numbers
Verify the currently selected page button has background color #007bff, text color #FFFFFF, and border radius 4px
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled
Verify the 'Previous' button is disabled
Verify the product image carousel has '3' slides, width 900px, height 500px, and slide transitions occur with a 500ms animation duration
Verify the left navigation arrow is visible
Verify the right navigation arrow is visible
Verify the embedded map widget's initial center coordinates are x 34.05, y -118.25, width 600px, height 400px, no watermark is present, and it is fully loaded within 1.5s
